exception.seleccionar_libro: You must select a book in the grid.
exception.seleccionar_orden: You must select an order in the grid.
exception.sin_cantidades_a_ingresar: There are no receptions loaded to register.
exception.orden_ya_entregada: The selected order has already been fully delivered.
exception.cantidad_excede_pedida: The entered quantity cannot exceed the ordered quantity.
exception.cantidad_vacia: The number of books cannot be blank.
exception.precio_vacio: The unit price cannot be blank.
exception.cantidad_invalida: The number of books must be an integer greater than 0.
exception.precio_invalido: The unit price must be a decimal greater than 0.
exception.seleccionar_solicitud: You must select a request in the grid.
exception.campos_vacios_libro: All books in the grid must have both quantity and unit price filled in.
exception.cantidad_invalida_libro: All books in the order must have a valid quantity entered.
exception.precio_invalido_libro: All books in the order must have a valid unit price entered.
exception.sin_libros_orden_compra: The order must have at least one book added.
exception.pago_no_completado: Payment could not be completed, the purchase order was not generated.

mensaje.cancelar: Are you sure you want to cancel the operation? The entered quantities and prices will be lost.
mensaje.eliminar: Do you want to delete the book from the order?
mensaje.confirmar_recepcion: Do you confirm the reception registration?
